install.name: J!Research Databases Modified Publication Form
install.author: Luis Galárraga
install.description: Plugin that wraps component Update Manager for Joomla! in order to support automatic J!Research upgrades

param.name: extractor
param.label: Extraction Method
param.description: The method to use when extracting files. Note that PEAR Archive_Tar does not use the Joomla! FTP layer.

param.name: download_method
param.label: Download Method
param.description: Method to download files with. Note: If cURL is selected but not installed, fopen will be used

param.name: use_proxy
param.label: Use Proxy
param.description: Use a named proxy server. Only available if cURL is used or fopen on PHP5+. Only basic authentication is supported for proxies that require authentication.

param.name: proxy_user
param.label: Proxy username
param.description: Username for proxy servers that require authentication. Authentication is disabled if left blank

param.name: proxy_pass
param.label: Proxy password
param.description: Password for proxy servers taht require authentication. This is ignored if the username is left blank

param.name: cached_update
param.label: Use Cached Update Method
param.description: This method permits you to place the update file and the correct package and this will be used instead of using an internet connection
